com.axibase.tsd.model.portal.PortalConfi.name: nginx-plus
com.axibase.tsd.model.portal.PortalConfi.content:
[configuration] title = NGINX Plus Status update-interval=5 step-line = false markers = false height-units = 5 width-units = 7 timespan = 1 day entity = ${entity}
################################################################################ 1st ROW [group] [widget] type = property width-units = 2 title = Server properties: ${entity} transpose = true time-span = 15 minute class = terminal [column] key=address [column] key=pid [column] key=nginx_version [column] key=generation [column] key=load_timestamp [property] type = nginx_info ############ [widget] width-units = 3 type = chart title = Connections tooltip = Connection info statistics = counter label-format = label metric = nginx-plus.connections.active [dropdown] change-field = metric options = nginx-plus.connections.active, nginx-plus.connections.dropped, nginx-plus.connections.idle, nginx-plus.connections.accepted format = keepAfter(value, 'nginx-plus.') [series] color = blue label = Current style = stroke: 4px [series] color = orange label = -1 day time-offset = 1 day [series] color = gray label = -1 week time-offset = 1 week ############ [widget] width-units = 2 type = chart title = SSL tooltip = SSL information statistics = counter label-format = label metric = nginx-plus.ssl.handshakes [dropdown] change-field = metric options = nginx-plus.ssl.handshakes, nginx-plus.ssl.handshakes_failed, nginx-plus.ssl.session_reuses format = keepAfter(value, 'nginx-plus.') [series] color = blue label = Current style = stroke: 4px [series] color = orange label = -1 day time-offset = 1 day [series] color = gray label = -1 week time-offset = 1 week ################################################################################ 2nd ROW [group] [widget] type = chart title = Respawned processes tooltip = The total number of abnormally terminated and respawned child processes. statistics = counter label-format = label metric = nginx-plus.processes.respawned [series] color = brown label = Current style = stroke: 4px ############ [widget] width-units = 3 type = chart title = Cache Statistics statistic = counter [dropdown] change-field = series.metric options = nginx-plus.bytes, nginx-plus.responses, nginx-plus.bytes_written, nginx-plus.responses_written format = keepAfter(value, 'nginx-plus.') [dropdown] change-field = series.tags.cache_status <#assign states = getTags("nginx-plus.bytes", "${entity}", "cache_status") > options = ${states?join(", ")} [dropdown] change-field = series.tags.name <#assign names = getTags("nginx-plus.bytes", "${entity}", "name") > options = ${names?join(", ")} [series] metric = nginx-plus.responses color = green [tags] type = caches name = ${names[0]} cache_status = hit ############ [widget] title = Cache hit rate today, % type = gauge tooltip = Percentage of cache hits today(100 * hit / (hit + miss)) end-time = next_day statistic = counter period = 1 day style= padding-left: 40px; padding-right: 40px; gradient-count = 5, 4, 5 gradient-intensity = 0 / .75 ticks = 4 format = decimal(3) display-tip = false thresholds = 0, 25, 75, 100 colors = red, yellow, green [dropdown] change-field = series.tags.name <#assign names = getTags("nginx-plus.bytes", "${entity}", "name") > options = ${names?join(", ")} [series] metric = nginx-plus.responses alias = hit display = false [tags] type = caches cache_status = hit name = ${names[0]} [series] metric = nginx-plus.responses alias = miss display = false [tags] type = caches cache_status = miss name = ${names[0]} [series] color = magenta label = Hit rate, % value = (value('miss') + value('hit') == 0) ? 0 : 100 * value('hit') / (value('miss') + value('hit')) ############ [widget] type = property title = Cache Properties width-units = 2 transpose = true time-span = 15 minute [column] key=name label=cache [column] key=cold [column] key=size format = kilobytes [column] key=max_size format = kilobytes [property] type = caches ################################################################################ 3rd ROW [group] [widget] width-units = 3 type = chart title = Server Zones' General Info statistic = counter metric = nginx-plus.requests [dropdown] change-field = metric options = nginx-plus.requests, nginx-plus.received, nginx-plus.processing, nginx-plus.discarded, nginx-plus.sent format = keepAfter(value, 'nginx-plus.') [dropdown] change-field = series.tags.name <#assign names = getTags("nginx-plus.discarded", "${entity}", "name") > options = ${names?join(", ")} [series] label = Current color = blue [tags] type = server_zones name = ${names[0]} [series] label = -1 day color = orange time-offset = 1 day [tags] type = server_zones name = ${names[0]} [series] label = -1 week color = gray time-offset = 1 week [tags] type = server_zones name = ${names[0]} ############ [widget] width-units = 3 type = chart title = Server Zones' Responses statistic = counter metric = nginx-plus.responses.4xx [dropdown] change-field = metric options = nginx-plus.responses.1xx, nginx-plus.responses.2xx,nginx-plus.responses.3xx,nginx-plus.responses.4xx,nginx-plus.responses.5xx,nginx-plus.responses.total format = keepAfter(value, 'nginx-plus.') [dropdown] change-field = series.tags.name <#assign names = getTags("nginx-plus.responses.1xx", "${entity}", "name") > options = ${names?join(", ")} [series] label = Current color = blue [tags] type = server_zones name = ${names[0]} [series] label = -1 day color = orange time-offset = 1 day [tags] type = server_zones name = ${names[0]} [series] label = -1 week color = gray time-offset = 1 week [tags] type = server_zones name = ${names[0]} ############ [widget] width-units = 1 type = chart title = Upstreams' Keepalive tooltip = The current number of idle keepalive connections. statistic = counter [dropdown] change-field = series.tags.name <#assign names = getTags("nginx-plus.keepalive", "${entity}", "name") > options = ${names?join(", ")} [series] metric = nginx-plus.keepalive color = yellow [tags] type = upstreams name = ${names[0]} ################################################################################ 4th ROW [group] [widget] width-units = 5 type = chart title = Upstream Peers' Statistics statistic = counter [dropdown] change-field = series.metric options = nginx-plus.active, nginx-plus.downstart, nginx-plus.downtime, nginx-plus.fails, nginx-plus.health_checks.checks, nginx-plus.health_checks.fails, nginx-plus.health_checks.unhealthy, nginx-plus.received, nginx-plus.requests, nginx-plus.responses.1xx, nginx-plus.responses.2xx, nginx-plus.responses.3xx, nginx-plus.responses.4xx, nginx-plus.responses.5xx, nginx-plus.responses.total, nginx-plus.selected, nginx-plus.sent, nginx-plus.unavail format = keepAfter(value, 'nginx-plus.') [dropdown] change-field = series.tags.upstream <#assign upstreams = getTags("nginx-plus.requests", "${entity}", "upstream") > options = ${upstreams?join(", ")} [dropdown] change-field = series.tags.server <#assign peers = getTags("nginx-plus.requests", "${entity}", "server") > options = ${peers?join(", ")} [series] metric = nginx-plus.active color = green [tags] type = upstreams.peers upstream = ${upstreams[0]} server = ${peers[0]} ########### [widget] type = property width-units = 2 title = Upstream Peers' properties time-span = 15 minute [column] key=server label=peer [column] key=upstream [column] key=state [column] key=backup [column] key=weight [column] key=id [column] key=last_passed [property] type = upstreams.peers ################################################################################ 5th ROW [group] [widget] width-units = 2 type = chart title = Stream Server Zones' General Info statistic = counter [dropdown] change-field = series.metric options = nginx-plus.connections, nginx-plus.processing, nginx-plus.received, nginx-plus.sent format = keepAfter(value, 'nginx-plus.') [dropdown] change-field = series.tags.name <#assign names = getTags("nginx-plus.connections", "${entity}", "name") > options = ${names?join(", ")} [series] metric = nginx-plus.connections color = magenta [tags] type = stream.server_zones name = ${names[0]} ############# [widget] width-units = 3 type = chart title = Stream Peers' Statistics statistic = counter [dropdown] change-field = series.metric options = nginx-plus.active, nginx-plus.connections, nginx-plus.connect_time, nginx-plus.downstart, nginx-plus.downtime, nginx-plus.fails, nginx-plus.first_byte_time, nginx-plus.health_checks.checks, nginx-plus.health_checks.unhealthy, nginx-plus.max_conns, nginx-plus.received, nginx-plus.response_time, nginx-plus.selected, nginx-plus.sent, nginx-plus.unavail format = keepAfter(value, 'nginx-plus.') [dropdown] change-field = series.tags.upstream <#assign upstreams = getTags("nginx-plus.connections", "${entity}", "upstream") > options = ${upstreams?join(", ")} [dropdown] change-field = series.tags.server <#assign peers = getTags("nginx-plus.connections", "${entity}", "server") > options = ${peers?join(", ")} [series] metric = nginx-plus.active color = green [tags] type = stream.upstreams.peers upstream=${upstreams[0]} server = ${peers[0]} ########### [widget] type = property width-units = 3 title = Stream Upstreams Peers' Properties time-span = 15 minute [column] key=server label=peer [column] key=upstream [column] key=state [column] key=backup [column] key=weight [column] key=id [column] key=last_passed [property] type = stream.upstreams.peers
